name: country_region_cities
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool geodb_cities.
Tool description: Get global city, region, and country data. Filter and display results in multiple languages.
API description: Fetches a list of cities within a specified region of a given country from the GeoDB API.

countryid.description: An ISO-3166 country code or WikiData ID.

regioncode.description: An ISO-3166 or FIPS region code.

limit.description: The maximum number of results to retrieve. Defaults to None.

hateoasmode.description: Include HATEOAS-style links in results. Defaults to None.

asciimode.description: Display results using ASCII characters. Defaults to None.

nameprefixdefaultlangresults.description: When name-prefix matching, whether or not to match on names in the default language if a non-default language is requested

timezoneids.description: Only include cities in these time zones. Comma-separated values. Defaults to None.

nameprefix.description: Only include cities whose names start with this prefix. If languagecode is set, the prefix will be matched on the name as it appears in that language. Defaults to None.

types.description: Only include cities of these types (comma-separated): CITY, ADM2. Defaults to None.

minpopulation.description: Only include cities with at least this population. Defaults to None.

languagecode.description: Display results in this language. Defaults to None.

offset.description: The zero-based offset into the results. Defaults to None.

maxpopulation.description: Only include cities with no more than this population. Defaults to None.

includedeleted.description: Whether to include any cities marked deleted. Options are: ALL, SINCE_YESTERDAY, SINCE_LAST_WEEK, NONE. Defaults to None.

sort.description: How to sort the results. Format: ±SORT_FIELD,±SORT_FIELD where SORT_FIELD = elevation, name, population. Defaults to None.
